blogs.title: Blogs

form.errorMessage: An error occured while trying to save the blog. Please try again.

list.empty: You have not created any blogs yet. Click the button at the top right to add one.

blogs.upgradeToCreateMore: You have to upgrade your plan to create more blogs.

agreementModal.title: Terms of Use
agreementModal.description: Please read the terms of use carefully and confirm before continuing.
agreementModal.1: I am the (co-)owner of the blog and agree to add it to this service.
agreementModal.2: The full text of all blog posts is made available via an Atom or RSS feed under the Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International License.

dashboard.pageDescription: This is a private page that shows the blogs managed by you.

deleteBlogModal.title: Delete blog
deleteBlogModal.description: Do you really want to delete this blog? This action cannot be undone.

deleteBlog.errorMessage: There was an error trying to delete the blog. Please try again.

noSubscriptionAlert.message: You don't have any active subscription. On the free plan, you can only have 1 blog. Upgrade to a paid plan to add more blogs.
